reviewText: we also love Prime, so my little guy can watch all the Thomas he wants free :)  if you don't have prime, get it now.
Title: Thomas & Friends: Rescue on the Rails

reviewText: My son loved this!! He was  amazed with the clarity & how it was just like 'regular movies'. Two thumbs up.
Title: Thomas & Friends: Rescue on the Rails

reviewText: Thought this movie would be a great addition to his Thomas movies. He liked it but has only watched it once. Maybe in time he will be interested in it but doesn't seem to be right now.
Title: Thomas & Friends: Rescue on the Rails

reviewText: The DVD of Thomas : Rescue on the Rails, arrived on time and in excellent condition. This will be a great addition to the collection of DVDs for my Grand Daughter, who is a big fan of thomas the Train engine.
Title: Thomas & Friends: Rescue on the Rails

reviewText: It is all about my grandson who adores Thomas!!! Thank you so much for allowing us to watch these movies!!! He would watch these movies twenty four seven if he were allowed but he is not Ha ha!!
Title: Thomas & Friends: Rescue on the Rails

reviewText: My toddler (4 1/2) loves Thomas & Friends, and this episode(s) of rescues will not disappoint your child.  Highly recommend to any Thomas fan.
